name: Audio Runner (Wolderado)
description:
This game can be played only by audio. It's a rhythm runner game. There are visuals in the game but our main goal was to create an accessible game for everyone. It is recommended to use headphones.

How to play:

  • Hit the correct button on the music's beat
  • Click the left mouse button to jump when you hear fire sounds
  • Click the right mouse button to hit when you hear mosquito sounds

This game made by these people:

Salih Unal (Coding)

Oguzhan Kalkuz (Coding & Level 2 music)

Chirine Haddad (Level 1 music & Sound Effects)

Ilknur Saduc (Sketch & Art)
